whiterun_jobs.description: Track Thieves Guild operations and jobs in Whiterun

guild_foothold_whiterun.name: Guild Foothold in Whiterun
guild_foothold_whiterun.description: Establishing a permanent Thieves Guild presence in Whiterun
guild_foothold_whiterun.completion_effect: Permanent Thieves Guild operations established in Whiterun with local fence and safe house access
advancement_triggers: Earn Olfrid's endorsement by aiding during the Battle of Whiterun (+1; unlock cap)
setback_triggers: Jobs go wrong and attract attention (-1)

gate.note: Olfrid fully opens the Whiterun door once you prove your value during the Battle of Whiterun—on either side—so long as he benefits and your cover holds.

guild_foothold_whiterun.continuity_note: This clock is for Thieves Guild story and can be activated when a PC pursues that path.

battleborn_quiet_inquiry.name: Battle-Born Quiet Inquiry
battleborn_quiet_inquiry.description: Olfrid quietly verifies the hooded Altmer and traces the new Arcana front; internal investigation before outsiders.
battleborn_quiet_inquiry.completion_effect: Battle-Born channels produce a usable description/route-of-travel trail; risk of sale/leak to guards or Dominion contacts.
advancement_triggers: Any staff member is left frightened/angry and talks (+1)
You are seen entering/leaving Battle-Born Arcana (+1)
Olfrid catches a lie or inconsistency (+2)
setback_triggers: Provide a clean, verifiable cover identity (-1)
Deliver on a high-value promise to Olfrid (-1)

battleborn_strongbox.name: Battle-Born Strongbox Job
battleborn_strongbox.description: Retrieve the iron-banded strongbox from Battle-Born Manor for Olfrid
battleborn_strongbox.completion_effect: Job completed, payment received (250 gold + intel), Guild reputation with Whiterun contacts increased
phases: Phase 0: Gain access to Battle-Born Manor
Phase 1: Locate and breach the concealed wall safe
Phase 2: Extract strongbox from manor grounds
Phase 3: Deliver to Olfrid or arrange hand-off
battleborn_strongbox.continuity_note: This clock is for Thieves Guild story and can be activated when a PC pursues that path.
